cast.overview: Léon, the top hit man in New York, has earned a rep as an effective "cleaner". But when his next-door neighbors are wiped out by a loose-cannon DEA agent, he becomes the unwilling custodian of 12-year-old Mathilda. Before long, Mathilda's thoughts turn to revenge, and she considers following in Léon's footsteps.
cast.title: Léon: The Professional

cast.overview: Paris, France, December 1897. The young playwright Edmond Rostand feels like a failure. Inspiration has abandoned him. Married and father of two children, desperate and penniless, he persuades the great actor Constant Coquelin to perform the main role in his new play. But there is a problem: Coquelin wants to premiere it at Christmas and Edmond has not written a single word.
cast.title: Cyrano, My Love

details.biography: Marc Andréoni was born on February 8, 1961 in France. He is an actor and writer, known for 3 Days to Kill (2014), Léon: The Professional (1994) and District B13 (2004).
details.name: Marc Andréoni
